a = _{{2*j}}_
\(\Rightarrow\) Since they are directly proportional.
\(\Rightarrow\) No. of Km \(\div\) Total fare = k
\(\Rightarrow\) k= (\(\frac a{_{j}_}) = \frac {(4 \times _{j}_)}{a}\)
\(\Rightarrow (a^2) = 4 \times (_{j}_^2)\)
\(\Rightarrow\) Hence, a= _{{2*j}}_
